description: Manages a Version of a Shared Image within a Shared Image Gallery.

Name.description: The Azure Region in which this Image Version should exist.

RegionalReplicaCount.description: The number of replicas of the Image Version to be created per region.

StorageAccountType.description: The storage account type for the image version, which defaults to `Standard_LRS`. You can store all of your image version replicas in Zone Redundant Storage by specifying `Standard_ZRS`.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

ExcludeFromLatest.description: Should this Image Version be excluded from the `latest` filter? If set to `true` this Image Version won't be returned for the `latest` version. Defaults to `false`.

GalleryName.description: The name of the Shared Image Gallery in which the Shared Image exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

ImageName.description: The name of the Shared Image within the Shared Image Gallery in which this Version should be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Location.description: The Azure Region in which the Shared Image Gallery exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

ManagedImageId.description: The ID of the Managed Image which should be used for this Shared Image Version. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Name.description: The version number for this Image Version, such as `1.0.0`. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

ResourceGroupName.description: The name of the Resource Group in which the Shared Image Gallery exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

Tags.description: A collection of tags which should be applied to this resource.
